Title: Relates to the suspension and revocation of certain learner's permits and the return of numbered plates and registration suspensions in certain circumstances
Summary: Provides for the suspension and revocation of certain learner's permits, and the return of numbered plates and registration suspensions in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง510-c, add ยง607, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the suspension and revocation of certain learner's permits and the return of numbered plates and registration suspensions in certain circumstances
